name: part_004
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン生誕祭2021】いっぱいありがとう！！Birthday Live2021【ホロライブ⧸紫咲シオン】 [oLZxkEJAm8U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Shion Murasaki and Pekora Usada perform the song 'The Snow White Princess is'.
MC section where Shion and Pekora talk about their first 3D collab and their history together.

subtitles.original: 突き刺さる憎しみは
subtitles.english: The piercing hatred

subtitles.original: ドラマチックな事情
subtitles.english: Is a dramatic circumstance

subtitles.original: 祈っても君はまだ来ない
subtitles.english: Even if I pray, you still don't come

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡よ 鏡さん
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, mirror-san

subtitles.original: メイクタイム 任せよ頬に愛
subtitles.english: Make-up time, leave it to the love on my cheeks

subtitles.original: サーチするからね 妬みをかわれてしまった
subtitles.english: I'll search for it, I've been envied

subtitles.original: 七つの小人はいるけれど
subtitles.english: There are seven dwarves, but...

subtitles.original: お助けそぶり 知らんぷりね
subtitles.english: They make no move to help, feigning ignorance

subtitles.original: そっと首を掴まれ
subtitles.english: My neck is gently seized

subtitles.original: 一粒の涙さえも
subtitles.english: Even a single tear

subtitles.original: 救えなくて
subtitles.english: I cannot save

subtitles.original: 呼吸もままならない
subtitles.english: I can barely breathe

subtitles.original: 視界失せた
subtitles.english: My vision is lost

subtitles.original: 消えそうだから早く駆けてほしいの
subtitles.english: I'm about to fade away, so I want you to run here quickly

subtitles.original: わけは聞かないで 答えられない
subtitles.english: Don't ask why, I can't answer

subtitles.original: 何万回憎まれれば 不快ハイの事情
subtitles.english: If I'm hated tens of thousands of times, it's an unpleasant 'high' circumstance

subtitles.original: もうすぐでいなくなるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'll be gone soon

subtitles.original: 途切れてく 命の音
subtitles.english: The sound of life is cutting out

subtitles.original: 毒リンゴを食した
subtitles.english: I ate the poisoned apple

subtitles.original: 少女のように眠りにつく
subtitles.english: I fall into a sleep like that of a girl

subtitles.original: お願い キスで目覚ましてほしいの
subtitles.english: Please, I want you to wake me with a kiss

subtitles.original: 胸の中の声 届きますか
subtitles.english: Can the voice in my chest reach you?

subtitles.original: 階段を上ったらドアを開けるだけで
subtitles.english: Just by opening the door after climbing the stairs

subtitles.original: 見つかるよ
subtitles.english: I'll be found

subtitles.original: お願い キスで目覚ましてほしいの
subtitles.english: Please, I want you to wake me with a kiss

subtitles.original: 白い棺から連れ出すように
subtitles.english: As if to take me out of the white coffin

subtitles.original: 突き刺さる憎しみは
subtitles.english: The piercing hatred

subtitles.original: ドラマチックな事情
subtitles.english: Is a dramatic circumstance

subtitles.original: 祈っても君はまだ来ない
subtitles.english: Even if I pray, you still don't come

subtitles.original: 消えてしまう
subtitles.english: I will fade away

subtitles.original: その前に
subtitles.english: Before that happens

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: シオンちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Shion-chan!

subtitles.original: ペコちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Peko-chan!

subtitles.original: はぁー、今日来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Haa, thank you for coming today!

subtitles.original: いーって、当たり前ぺこ！
subtitles.english: It's fine, of course, peko!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: シオン先輩の生誕祭！お誕生日おめでとうぺこ！
subtitles.english: Shion-senpai's birthday celebration! Happy birthday, peko!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Thank you! I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: 2人で3Dコラボって初めてぺこ？
subtitles.english: Is this our first 3D collab together, peko?

subtitles.original: え、確かに！
subtitles.english: Eh, certainly!

subtitles.original: なんかさ、今までさ、大人数の3Dとかもないよね、多分。
subtitles.english: Like, until now, we haven't even had a large group 3D together, probably.

subtitles.original: いや、そうだね。なんか、こうやって。
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's right. Like, in this way.

subtitles.original: 3Dないよね。ライブとかでしか。
subtitles.english: We haven't had a 3D. Only at lives and such.

subtitles.original: うん、そうそう。ライブとか、2人もないしね、3D。
subtitles.english: Yeah, exactly. At lives, and not just the two of us in 3D.

subtitles.original: なんでなかったんだろう、今まで。
subtitles.english: I wonder why we haven't until now.

subtitles.original: なんでなかったぺこ！？
subtitles.english: Why not, peko!?

subtitles.original: こんなにできたいじゃん！
subtitles.english: We wanted to do it this much!

subtitles.original: なんで？なんで？
subtitles.english: Why? Why?

subtitles.original: すねないでよ。
subtitles.english: Don't sulk.

subtitles.original: 他の人と仲良くしてんじゃないぺこ。ちょっと！
subtitles.english: You're being friendly with other people, peko. Hey!

subtitles.original: え、自分も、自分も！
subtitles.english: Eh, me too, me too!

subtitles.original: どうして今日呼んでくれたの？
subtitles.english: Why did you invite me today?

subtitles.original: どうして今日呼んでくれたの？いいじゃん！
subtitles.english: Why did you invite me today? It's fine!

subtitles.original: ペコちゃん、だって、あのね。
subtitles.english: Peko-chan, because, well...

subtitles.original: なんかさ、普段ゲーム配信とかではコラボとかはちょこちょこしてたもんね。
subtitles.english: Like, usually we've done collabs here and there on game streams, right?

subtitles.original: してたし、でも歌初めてだよね。
subtitles.english: We did, but singing is for the first time, right?

subtitles.original: そうぺこだからさ、シオン先輩と歌えてぺこら、すごい嬉しかったぺこ！
subtitles.english: That's right, peko, so Pekora was really happy to be able to sing with Shion-senpai, peko!

subtitles.original: え、嬉しかったよ、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Eh, I was happy too, thank you.

subtitles.original: かわいいやつめ。
subtitles.english: What a cute one.

subtitles.original: そうだね、ゲームはあるね。最初のコラボって何だっけ？2人でさ。
subtitles.english: Right, games we have. What was our first collab? Just the two of us.

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って。忘れたぺこなんですか？
subtitles.english: Wait a minute. Did you forget, peko?

subtitles.original: え、待って。え！？
subtitles.english: Eh, wait. Eh!?

subtitles.original: 皆さん！ちょっと待ってください！この方、この方忘れてる！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Please wait a moment! This person, this person forgot!

subtitles.original: 覚えてるよ！
subtitles.english: I remember!

subtitles.original: じゃあ言ってみなさい！あんた何だか言ってみなさいよ。ぺこら覚えてっからな。
subtitles.english: Then try saying it! You, try saying what it was. Pekora remembers, you know.

subtitles.original: え、え、あれあれあれ。あのなんか、ホラゲーみたいのやったじゃん、ホラゲー。
subtitles.english: Eh, eh, that, that, that. We did something like a horror game, a horror game.
